Protocols/WGDelegate.html#/s:vP7WidGame1.name: isExpandable
Protocols/WGDelegate.html#/s:vP7WidGame1.abstract: A bool that defines if the widget should be expandable or not.

Protocols/WGDelegate.html#/s:vP7WidGame1.name: maxHeight
Protocols/WGDelegate.html#/s:vP7WidGame1.abstract: A CGFloat that defines the widget’s maximum height.

Protocols/WGDelegate.html.name: WGDelegate
Protocols/WGDelegate.html.abstract: Defines which widget properties can be changed from the game scene.

Classes/WGViewController/ExitReason.html.name: leftTheScreen
Classes/WGViewController/ExitReason.html.abstract: Sent when the widget leaves the screen.

Classes/WGViewController/ExitReason.html.name: memoryWarning
Classes/WGViewController/ExitReason.html.abstract: Sent when the widget receives a memory warning.

Classes/WGViewController.html#/s:vC7WidG.name: gameView
Classes/WGViewController.html#/s:vC7WidG.abstract: The SKView that will present your WidGame scenes.

Classes/WGViewController/ExitReason.html.name: ExitReason
Classes/WGViewController/ExitReason.html.abstract: An enum that provides the reasons which your widget might close.

Classes/WGViewController.html#/s:FC7WidG.name: viewDidDisappear(_:)
Classes/WGViewController.html#/s:FC7WidG.abstract: Notifies the view controller that its view was removed from a view hierarchy.

Classes/WGViewController.html#/s:FC7WidG.name: didReceiveMemoryWarning()
Classes/WGViewController.html#/s:FC7WidG.abstract: Sent to the view controller when the app receives a memory warning.

Classes/WGViewController.html#/s:FC7WidG.name: widgetMightClose(reason:)
Classes/WGViewController.html#/s:FC7WidG.abstract: Called when the widget is in a situation that it might be closed. An exit reason is provided to the method, so your logic can react accordingly.

Classes/WGViewController.html#/s:FC7WidG.name: viewWillTransition(to:with:)
Classes/WGViewController.html#/s:FC7WidG.abstract: Notifies the container that the size of its view is about to change.

Classes/WGViewController.html#/s:FC7WidG.name: presentInitialScene()
Classes/WGViewController.html#/s:FC7WidG.abstract: Override this method to show your first scene and load any saved info.

Classes/WGViewController.html#/s:FC7WidG.name: viewDidLayoutSubviews()
Classes/WGViewController.html#/s:FC7WidG.abstract: If you override the method below inside your TodayViewController, always call super at some point in your implementation so that WidGame can still update your gameView’s frame and tell your game scene about these updates.

Classes/WGViewController.html#/s:FC7WidG.name: widgetActiveDisplayModeDidChange(_:withMaximumSize:)
Classes/WGViewController.html#/s:FC7WidG.abstract: If you override the method below inside your TodayViewController, always call super at some point in your implementation so that WidGame can still delegate displayMode changes to your WGScene, and set the correct preferredContentSize to your widget.

Classes/WGScene.html#/s:FC7WidGame7WGSce.name: widgetActiveDisplayModeDidChange(_:withMaximumSize:)
Classes/WGScene.html#/s:FC7WidGame7WGSce.abstract: Called when the active display mode changes.

Classes/WGScene.html#/s:vC7WidGame7WGSce.name: widgetDelegate
Classes/WGScene.html#/s:vC7WidGame7WGSce.abstract: Allows your game scene to change the widget’s expandability or maximum height.

Classes/WGScene.html#/s:FC7WidGame7WGSce.name: init(coder:)
Classes/WGScene.html#/s:FC7WidGame7WGSce.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/WGScene.html.name: WGScene
Classes/WGScene.html.abstract: All your widget game scenes should inherit from this class, instead of SKScene.

Classes/WGViewController.html.name: WGViewController
Classes/WGViewController.html.abstract: Your TodayViewController should inherit from WGViewController to implement WidGame’s functionalities.
